member.name: M:HospitalManagementSystem.Controllers.Controllers.EmployeesController.GetEmployeesAsync
member.summary: Retrieves a list of employees from the database.
member.returns: An ActionResult containing a Response object with a list of GETEmployee objects.
member.remarks: This method fetches all employees from the database and returns them in a list. Successful responses will have a status code of 200 (OK).
member.response: Returns a list of GETEmployee objects.
